item.title: Black elite+dagonhai g.e boxset (rel)
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:9, topic:273211”] class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Open"; 

if(wearID == xxx){
sM("You open the box and receive ___.");
addItem(xxx, 1);
addItem(xxx, 1);
addItem(xxx, 1);
return false;
}

Wow that was hard.

I’ll explain it to you too!
When you click the box it checks the ID, then sends a message adds the Items.
The return false; makes it so it doesn’t equip it.
Grats!..[/quote]
oo your cool now set it so you need level 99 str attack and def and make so you have to have a quest done.

Read full topic

item.title: Black elite+dagonhai g.e boxset (rel)
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

	class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
	class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Open";
if(wearID == xxx){
sM("You open the box and receive ___.");
addItem(xxx, 1);
addItem(xxx, 1);
addItem(xxx, 1);
return false;
}

Wow that was hard.

I’ll explain it to you too!
When you click the box it checks the ID, then sends a message adds the Items.
The return false; makes it so it doesn’t equip it.
Grats!..

item.title: Black elite+dagonhai g.e boxset (rel)
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

nothing major, jus the g.e boxsets for the ppl that need them, i noticed them whilst looking threw the cache, hope they help someone

if(i == ****) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "****"; class8.anInt174 = 7001; class8.anInt181 = 1800; // zoom; increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 245; // model rotate; up+down increase to move down away from you class8.anInt198 = 80; // model rotate; side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -2; // model offset; increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 3; // model offset; increase to move up class8.aString170 = "blah"; class8.aByteArray178 = "your info here".getBytes(); } if(i == ****) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "****"; class8.anInt174 = 7002; class8.anInt181 = 1800; // zoom; increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 245; // model rotate; up+down increase to move down away from you class8.anInt198 = 80; // model rotate; side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -2; // model offset; increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 3; // model offset; increase to move up class8.aString170 = "blah"; class8.aByteArray178 = "your info here"getBytes(); }

DOWNLOAD LINK (already gzipped)
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=7PSD0MPM

PICTURES

dont forget guys, ingame once uve extracted the models to your model folder to do
add model 7000
add model 7001

with out any :: / exactly how its written

well i hope it helps somone :woot:

gary
